mapper.sql: id, equipment_name, equipment_number, equipment_self_number, standard_model, vender, equipment_type, rights_unit, Record_number, belong_warehouse, project_address, finance_lease, invoice_number, purchase_contract, manufacturing_license_no, product_date, purchase_date, retire_date, unit_responsible_person, department, building_no, equipment_source, registrant, confirm_person, invoice_time, financing_maturity_date, manufacturing_no, manufacturer, contract_unit_price, amount, rate, exclusive_tax_price, taxation, depreciation__rate, contact_number, registration_time, acknowledging_time, financing_batch, `financing amount`, insert_person, insert_person_depart_id, update_person, update_person_depart_id, insert_date, update_date
mapper.select:
select
from wm_equipment_entry
and equipment_name like concat('%', #{equipmentName}, '%')
and equipment_number= #{equipmentNumber}
and vender like concat('%', #{vender}, '%')
and equipment_self_number like concat('%', #{equipmentSelfNumber}, '%')
and standard_model like concat('%', #{standardModel}, '%')
and equipment_type like concat('%', #{equipmentType}, '%')
and rights_unit like concat('%', #{rightsUnit}, '%')
and Record_number like concat('%', #{recordNumber}, '%')
and belong_warehouse like concat('%', #{belongWarehouse}, '%')
and project_address like concat('%', #{projectAddress}, '%')
and date_format(purchase_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{purchaseDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(retire_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{retireDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(financing_maturity_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{financingMaturityDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(insert_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{insertDate},'%y%m%d')
